full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### NPP – S5037673 - Temporary Help Services
#### Notice Details

Information sharing partner: Government of Canada
Notice Number: cb-509-30323680
Request for Proposal: S5037673
Publication Date: July 8, 2024
Tender Closing Date: July 15, 2024 2:00 p.m. ET

#### Tender Details

Tender Title: Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
Tender Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
Tender Status: Expired

#### Notification and Documents

The Government of Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal in response to the RFP for Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). The tender document is available on the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/41793/s5037673-rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/40498/s5037673-rfp.pdf). Mandatory Attachment.

### Description of the Requirement

This request is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories:

* Stream 5: Computer Application Support

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

1019837 Ontario Inc.
Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
Axons Canada Inc., Levio Conseils Inc., IN JOINT VENTURE
BRYCA Solutions Inc.
Green PI Inc
Kyndryl Canada Limited; ISM Information Systems Management Corporation IN JOINT VENTURE
Maverin Inc.
Northern Brainwaves Consulting Inc.
SoftSim Technologies Inc.
Spirit Personnel Inc.
Tech4soft Inc.

### Notice Contact

Contracting Entity:
Department of National Defense

Contact Information:

Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Procurement
Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 971-7955
Contact Person

UTAC Detail Number:
None

Security Clearance will be done by the selecting element. 

This tender invitation is not eligible for request for exemption 

Please let me know if this is what you are looking for in 400 words as requested. 

Attachments
